name: disk-util
title: Disk Utility
description: Makes it easy to manage AFPS disk volumes
author: stelo

commands.name: create-volume
commands.title: Create Volume
commands.description: Creates APFS volumes. For encrypted volumes, it generates a secure passphrase, creates the volume, and stores the passphrase in the system keychain so that the volume can be automatically decrypted and mounted on boot.

commands.name: show-volumes
commands.title: Show Volumes
commands.description: Show the disk volumes present on the system.

commands.name: quick-create-volume
commands.title: Quick Create Volume
commands.description: Quick create APFS volumes. For encrypted volumes, it generates a secure passphrase, creates the volume, and stores the passphrase in the system keychain so that the volume can be automatically decrypted and mounted on boot.
